title: Good buttt
text: The app is good but I hate the fact that they just changed the algorithm to see people‚Äôs post that I don‚Äôt follow. It‚Äôs extremely irritating. I only want to see who I follow and maybe have a discover page? But it‚Äôs extremely annoying seeing a thousand posts from random people who I don‚Äôt care about.

title: Promising but needs improvement
text:
As the title says: promising but needs improvement.
Sure, I get it, it‚Äôs a new app. But not being able to sort by feed by ONLY the people I follow makes the app uselss to me. I am zero interested in seeing all of the other irrelevant accounts it‚Äôs showing me. 
I‚Äôll wait and see but if this doesn‚Äôt change I‚Äôll have to leave the app

title: Needs a way to view all posts liked by a user
text:
We need a likes tab on profiles that users can choose to make private or public but that they have access to and can see all their liked posts at.

The likes feature should be used to connect and keep track of information but right now that information is hidden to the users while fully visible to the engineers. 

I understand it needs to be different than other platforms but I think accessing ‚Äúlikes‚Äù on profiles is a universal feature and would not make threads more like any other platform, it would just make it more user friendly.

Thanks!

title: fun but
text: this app is so fun and i like how easy it is to use. BUT please add a feature that lets you add your thread badge back up on your instagram!! i removed the badge thinking it was kinda ugly on my ig but i‚Äôm having so much fun on the app that i want to link it on my instagram and i can‚Äôt :(

title: DON‚ÄôT DOWNLOAD THIS
text: I downloaded this more out of curiosity than anything, and I was unimpressed but didn‚Äôt think much of it. Come to find out from a friend in IT that it collects A LOT of info about you and you CANNOT delete it without deleting your Instagram too. You can deactivate, but not delete, there‚Äôs no walking it back unless you delete Instagram too. honestly I‚Äôm so appalled by this I probably will delete Instagram, although that‚Äôs not without some sadness as that‚Äôs a platform I do like.

title: No overlap
text:
The app is fine and has been a good Twitter replacement but I‚Äôm hearing that they are posting threads on other platforms. I don‚Äôt want my content shared on other platforms and until there is a way to opt out, I have had to deactivate and delete it. 

I‚Äôll bring it back once that is the case.

title: Non-working features, non-responsive developers.
text:
Threads has ‚Äútopics.‚Äù Not only can I not tag any topic in my own posts, topics also do not show as the clickable link text as they do for everyone else.
I am in the U.S. I joined Threads on the second day. I have tried the app on different devices and on desktop. I have tried restarting my phone. I‚Äôve tried uninstalling and reinstalling. It‚Äôs been a MONTH, and nothing works. And no one from Threads/Meta will answer my questions.

title: It‚Äôs just as bad as Twitter
text: Honestly this app is just Twitter but with more complaining. Meta in general has ruined all the apps they have. It‚Äôs not about the people anymore it‚Äôs just about what makes them money. Bad algorithms and even worse moral high ground, rather than letting people post what they want and be real they want to police it all and make sure you only see ads or some clickbait from some fake person.

title: Useless
text:
This app feels like it was rushed. I do not understand why there are so many social media apps that do not do anything. I don‚Äôt see posts from people I actually follow. I get suggested trash and ads. 

No one sees what I post. I don‚Äôt see what anyone else posts. What is the use of this app? 

Posts can‚Äôt be filtered. The ‚Äútags‚Äù don‚Äôt really show me results that are useful. But then again there isn‚Äôt much content to be sifting through any how. I don‚Äôt think I will ever use this again.

title: Just as toxic as twitter
text: I keep seeing threads show up on instagram that I never asked to see and unrelated to content that I want to see on instagram, and the content is just as hateful as twitter. I have no way to turn this off and it‚Äôs genuinely distressing. It‚Äôs chock full of transphobia, rhetoric about working yourself to the bone for corporations, and other political and genuinely terrible things. I‚Äôm considering deleting instagram because of this app so that I stop having to be inundated unwillingly with hate.

title: default home page is awful
text:
GIVE ME THE OPTION TO VIEW MY FOLLOWED ACCOUNTS BY DEFAULT. The ‚Äúfor you‚Äù page is absolutely insane and I don‚Äôt care about 99% of what it‚Äôs try to show me. To pull up my ‚Äúfollowing‚Äù tab I have to refresh and press a spare button just to see the option. 

Today, for example, my first 3 posts were porn advertisements, Jeffery Epstein conspiracies and an ad for cheap crap. 

Fix your app, make it user friendly.

title: I like it
text: I like it but it keeps knocking me out of the app when I'm trying to respond or post a thread üßµI gotta try multiple times before it let's me finally post or comment. I'm trying to be easy due to its pre maturity but it's definitely aggy. Other than that I feel like we are freshman in a new school lol I rock with it üòÅ

title: Share to üëéüèæ
text: I‚Äôve tried for multiple hours to share from Instagram to Threadz to avoid redundant actions as a Social Media Content Manager. Went through numerous troubleshooting recommendations to no avail. Everyone knows that IG support does NOT get back to you, but I‚Äôm still awaiting a response. I continue to receive a ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre not logged into your Threadz‚Äù dialog‚Äî when it‚Äôs truly logged in and live. It‚Äôs just NOT connected and unable to capture my IG posts. It‚Äôs obvious this App needs more work.

title: Threads.
text: When it first came out I loved it. It reminded me of Twitter. I use it more then Twitter tbh. But now when I go to repost something it disappears and it‚Äôs no where to be found on my reposts or anywhere on my page. I think y‚Äôall need to create an update for it!

title: Getting back to old times
text: Back to the simple format with no nonsense that brings you back to the simpler times. Excited that this format works and it‚Äôs fully functional. Looking forward to what the future brings

title: Delete threads, delete instagram too
text: Ok so i like the app, but one thing that definitely needs to change is the fact that if someone whats to delete their account on threads, their instagram page goes too?!?!? Why? Thats my only gripe. We should have a choice in that matter. Dont do us dirty like that.

title: Needs some more features
text:
Love the new app but it needs a feed that can sorted chronologically and will only show the people you follow.

Also would be nice to have lists you can create. 

If this is truly going to be a Twitter alternative, these features need to added quickly so it‚Äôs a smooth transition.

title: Anything is better than Twitter!
text: Currently has some glitches that are already being addressed hoping for more sharing options for the profile. Sending the Threads profile to TikTok to Instagram as a story or post etc.

title: Thought to be the 1st reviewer.
text: Just downloaded this app and have no idea how it will change the world in coming years. Will upload detailed review after few months. Until then keep hitting the like button üòä

title: Threads Instagram Logout Issue
text: Every time I use it, it logs me out of my Instagram account. Using both Threads and Instagram seem to cancel each other out, requiring me to delete Threads to be able to use Instagram. There should be an easy way to switch users on Threads without logging you out of Instagram and vice versa.

title: misogynist and the most vile comments
text: I downloaded this app for a bit to see what all the hype was about. I felt my stomach churn when I saw that everything that was being promoted was the support of a genocide, the dehumanization of sex workers, homophobia, racism, and just blatant disregard and disrespect to women. This is sickening and obviously brainwashing to younger, impressionable audiences. Sure, America has free speech, but when you are clearly promoting horrid, cruel things against HALF the human race, there is obviously something very wrong about it all.

title: Profile disappeared
text: I created an account two weeks ago, and three days later it just suddenly stopped working. My profile won‚Äôt load (just says ‚ÄúContent Not Available‚Äù) and my notifications tab is also blank, it won‚Äôt load at all. I have put in several requests for support but can‚Äôt get the problem fixed. I‚Äôd love to be able to use this app, but it seems there is no one to fix when your profile goes MIA -____-

title: Was working great üòí now nothing will load
text: I sent a couple requests for support and have not heard back yet. It was working great but since last Thursday/Friday nothing will load except the main feed. I can‚Äôt post anything, I can‚Äôt see my previous posts, I can‚Äôt see the notifications tab, but the main feed is still updating just fine. Hopefully they resolve the issue before too long. Before this issue popped up, I‚Äôd have given a 5-Star review.

title: Improved!
text:
It still needs work. I‚Äôd like to see something akin to trends.

However, the content has improved a lot and so have my suggestions. More people I like are using it. The edit is a really nice feature.

Basically, not my fav but excited to see what it becomes,

title: awful
text:
User interface
This program keeps showing you things you don't want to see, you'll actually lose your followers in the crap it shows you.
security
This app doesn't just access your mother's underwear drawer, you actually give Zuckerberg your phone You don't have even 1% of the features and capabilities of apps like Telegram or Twitter
And most importantly, this app takes your Instagram account hostage after installation so that you can't delete it

title: Propaganda sound chamber
text: If you like your feed being overwhelmed with leftist ideology and propaganda then this is the place for you. My instagram feed has also been invaded with extremely divisive speech(reverse racism, hate speech, biased political stats) from the threads posts previews. All which I have very little interest in. Not a places for constructive dialogue. Just a bunch of fake accounts, keyboard warriors, and pseudo pornstars out of touch with reality and only interested in tearing people and communities down.

title: I got signed out ‚Äúplease wait a few minutes before you try again‚Äù
text: I have two accounts and been going back and forth logging in and out of both accounts. I guess the app thought I was a bit and blocked me or something. I can‚Äôt sign in anymore. Help please!

title: Too many notifications.
text: It sends about 20 notifications a day telling me someone I followed someone I on follow Instagram because they made a Threads account. I follow hundreds of people on Instagram, that‚Äôs too many notifications and I feel almost like it‚Äôs abusing it‚Äôs notification privileges as it‚Äôs just begging users to keep using it and that just kind of rubs be the wrong way. I‚Äôm just going to uninstall it, it‚Äôs just a clone of Twitter (X) with less features anyway.

title: Over-reliance on IG
text: I was looking forward to having a Twitter substitute for news and opinion. Sadly, Meta has explicitly stated this is not its goal. Moreover, it seems their algorithm is based on both your IG and Threads account. I follow pop culture on IG and wanted to use threads for news. But my entire Threads timeline seems to be recommendations based on my IG follows, not my Threads follows. My interest in the app is basically dead until reporters start using it and Meta is able to identify what a person wants to see on Threads specifically.

title: Needs work‚Ä¶but I like it
text:
I tried to create a Threads account for my business page on Insatgram, but it keeps taking me to my personal Threads account. I should be able to seamlessly switch between accounts on Threads app just like I can on Instagram. 
Also, I don‚Äôt like that my feed is constantly spammed by influencers and people I never agreed to follow. Fix that please.

title: Major potential but‚Ä¶
text:
If you a Twitter user you know Threads got a few tweaks to make if they really want to compete LOL, but it has potential‚ÄºÔ∏è. Once they add a few things we‚Äôre used to using on Twitter, I could see this platform taking offüöÄ

title: Excellent and unbiased üòç
text: I am sorry happy that threads does not remove any posts related to our religious, political or relationship status or any other social issues & we can freely express any view & this is what social media should be about!

title: Still lacking too many features.
text: These missing features are stopping me from using Threads: #1) Search: I want to be able to search for words and topics, not just users. #2) Desktop website / web app: I want to use Threads on my laptop. #3) Drafts: I want to be able to draft a Thread or Reply. #4) Scheduling: I want to be able to send a Thread or Reply at a later date and time.

title: Not loading all notifications accordingly
text: The app is still in its starting stages and it has its potential; at the same time, recently, all I see is two notifications in my notification box on Threads and nothing else shows up or loads. It‚Äôs in a forever loop of loading and that‚Äôs disappointing to say the least.

title: A little barebones, but an excellent start
text:
it'd be nice to have tags or be able to search for specific types of posts. 

the app, in its current state, only allows users to find others via their timeline, replies to posts, or by searching for usernames. 

having high hopes for the future of Threads!

title: FOLLOWERS & FOLLOWING

title: Excellent

title: Badge on instagram profile
text:

title: Great start
text:
I‚Äôm hoping this can be a permanent replacement for Twitter. Main points of annoyance:
 - Whenever I open the app, rather than letting me start from where I was it jumps up to a random point in the feed 
 - Badly needs following-only chronological feed
 - Recommendations are random, like influencers I wouldn‚Äôt care about, vs driven by the people I follow 
 - No desktop version

title: Meh. Potential but nothing special yet.
text: It has potential but they didnt fix what the issue was with twitter. You still can not edit a post after it has been shared. You also see a bunch of posts of accounts you are not following. Which defeats the purpose of trying to control the feed with things you chose.

title: So far so good!
text: I like the fact that instagram made another platform similar to twitter, i don't see the harm in expanding. Overall I've had a good experience so far, though i just downloaded it, everything is running smooth!
